Yoast SEO Premium plugin. --\u003e"])</script><script>self.__next_f.push([1,"ed:T1ae6,"])</script><script>self.__next_f.push([1,"\n\u003cp\u003eA legendary skull believed to belong to Cleopatra\u0026#8217;s treacherous sister is actually the remains of an 11-year-old boy, a recent study found.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eAn interdisciplinary team from the Austrian Academy of Sciences, equipped with state-of-the-art technology, analyzed their prized possession that Austrian archaeologist Josef Keil brought back from an excavation 100 years ago. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eBelieved to have once sat upon the body of Cleopatra’s sister Arsinoë IV, the contemporary team discovered an individual who completely opposed the original hypothesis: an 11-year-old boy with major health problems. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe new study opens up “a wide field for exciting research,’ which would include the whereabouts of Arsinoë IV.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003ch2 class=\"wp-block-heading\" id=\"h-a-famous-skull-in-history\"\u003eA famous skull in history \u003c/h2\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe Department of Evolutionary Anthropology team at the University of Vienna consisted of geneticists, dating specialists, orthodontists, and archaeologists.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThey set out to prove or disprove whether the skull was once attached to a famous royal who came to an untimely death; Arsinoë IV committed an act of treason in trying to claim Cleopatra’s throne.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eAfter all, the skull occupied a stately Egyptian plot on the main street of Ephesos, Turkey, leading Josef Keil to attribute it to “a very distinguished person” in her 20s. In 1953, an article supported the original claim.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eAnother team uncovered the rest of the skeleton in a niche of an antechamber of the burial chamber in 1982, as per a recent press release. The “magnificent” tomb reflected a particularly high status, and Arsinoë IV was executed on the steps of the Temple of Artemis. That couplet of facts resulted in the subsequent hypothesis in 1990 that the royal might have been laid to rest here.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eBut was she? \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cfigure class=\"wp-block-image size-full\"\u003e\u003cimg loading=\"lazy\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"1920\" height=\"1080\" src=\"https://cms.interestingengineering.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/202501_Weber_Abb5_01.jpg\" alt=\"\" class=\"wp-image-135343\" srcset=\"https://cms.interestingengineering.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/202501_Weber_Abb5_01.jpg 1920w, https://cms.interestingengineering.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/202501_Weber_Abb5_01.jpg?resize=300,169 300w, https://cms.interestingengineering.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/202501_Weber_Abb5_01.jpg?resize=768,432 768w, https://cms.interestingengineering.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/202501_Weber_Abb5_01.jpg?resize=1536,864 1536w\" sizes=\"auto, (max-width: 1920px) 100vw, 1920px\" /\u003e\u003cfigcaption class=\"wp-element-caption\"\u003eView of the Octagon in Ephesos along Curetes Street. Only the marble-clad base has survived. C: Austrian Academy of Sciences/\u003ca href=\"https://medienportal.univie.ac.at/en/media/recent-press-releases/detailansicht-en/artikel/cleopatras-sister-remains-missing/\"  target=\"_blank\"  rel=\"noopener noreferrer\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eAustrian Archaeological Institute\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/figcaption\u003e\u003c/figure\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003ch2 class=\"wp-block-heading\" id=\"h-studying-the-skull-of-cleopatra-s-sister\"\u003eStudying the skull of Cleopatra\u0026#8217;s sister\u003c/h2\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eRecent advancements in the University of Vienna\u0026#8217;s technological capabilities allowed the team of researchers to perform an exhaustive analysis to finally confirm the truth.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe first phase of the research involved taking a digital copy of the skull with micro-computed tomography and collecting samples from the base of the skull of the inner ear. Geneticists then confirmed that the skeleton in the antechamber matched the skull and samples of the femur.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe skull\u0026#8217;s age seemed to align with Keil\u0026#8217;s original analysis. Tests showed that it dates between 36 and 205 BCE. Arsinoë IV died within that timeframe, in 41 BCE. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026#8220;But then came the big surprise: in repeated tests, the skull and femur both clearly showed the presence of a Y chromosome \u0026#8211; in other words, a male,\u0026#8221; Gerhard Weber explained in a recent press \u003ca href=\"https://medienportal.univie.ac.at/en/media/recent-press-releases/detailansicht-en/artikel/cleopatras-sister-remains-missing/\"  target=\"_blank\"  rel=\"noopener noreferrer\" target=\"_blank\"\u003erelease\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eMicro-CT scans showed that the skull wasn\u0026#8217;t female at all but rather male. High-resolution dental roots and skull base images further validated the picture that was beginning to develop. It looked nothing like Josef Keil’s original snapshot.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eIn a surprising twist, they discovered that the 11-14-year-old \u003cem\u003eboy\u003c/em\u003e was even Roman. He suffered from a developmental pathology, if not a genetic syndrome, such as Treacher Collins syndrome mixed with a severe vitamin-D deficiency. One of his cranial bones, which doesn’t normally fuse until the age of 65, had already closed, effectively deforming the skull.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe underdeveloped upper jaw, “unusually angled downwards,” was “the most striking feature.” The boy most likely couldn’t chew. The first permanent molar showed no signs of use at all. Because of that, the first premolar showed significant wear and tear.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eAn intriguing profile emerged, but it looked nothing like her sister. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003ch2 class=\"wp-block-heading\" id=\"h-the-search-for-cleopatra-s-sister-continues\"\u003eThe search for Cleopatra\u0026#8217;s sister continues\u003c/h2\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eAfter 100 years, researchers determined the rightful owner of the \u003ca href=\"https://interestingengineering.com/science/britains-butchered-bones-cannibalism-study\"  target=\"_blank\"  rel=\"dofollow\"\u003eskull\u003c/a\u003e. It wasn\u0026#8217;t \u003ca href=\"https://interestingengineering.com/culture/marble-bust-possibly-depicting-cleopatra-true-face-found-egypt\"  target=\"_blank\"  rel=\"dofollow\"\u003eCleopatra’s\u003c/a\u003e sister who Marc Anthony ordered to be executed due to her attempt to usurp the throne. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"margin: 0px;padding: 0px\"\u003eIt remains to be seen why the boy was buried in such a prominent location and s\u003c/span\u003eumptuous \u003ca href=\"https://interestingengineering.com/culture/a-2000-year-old-sarcophagus-found-in-egypt-and-its-contents-are-still-a-mystery\"  target=\"_blank\"  rel=\"dofollow\"\u003eEgyptian tomb\u003c/a\u003e. The study has opened up a field of questions\u0026nbsp;about the boy and Cleopatra\u0026#8217;s sister. The hunt for Arnisoe IV continues.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cfigure class=\"wp-block-embed is-type-video is-provider-youtube wp-block-embed-youtube wp-embed-aspect-16-9 wp-has-aspect-ratio\"\u003e\u003cdiv class=\"wp-block-embed__wrapper\"\u003e\n\u003ciframe loading=\"lazy\" title=\"The Return of the Ekranoplan\" width=\"500\" height=\"281\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/q-hr-Qc4Dz0?feature=oembed\" frameborder=\"0\" allow=\"accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share\" referrerpolicy=\"strict-origin-when-cross-origin\" allowfullscreen\u003e\u003c/iframe\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e\u003c/figure\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n"])</script><script>self.__next_f.push([1,"ee:T4d7,"])</script><script>self.__next_f.push([1,"\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe new study opens up “a wide field for exciting research,’ which would include the whereabouts of Arsinoë IV.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003ch2 class=\"wp-block-heading\" id=\"h-a-famous-skull-in-history\"\u003eA famous skull in history \u003c/h2\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe Department of Evolutionary Anthropology team at the University of Vienna consisted of geneticists, dating specialists, orthodontists, and archaeologists.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThey set out to prove or disprove whether the skull was once attached to a famous royal who came to an untimely death; Arsinoë IV committed an act of treason in trying to claim Cleopatra’s throne.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eAfter all, the skull occupied a stately Egyptian plot on the main street of Ephesos, Turkey, leading Josef Keil to attribute it to “a very distinguished person” in her 20s. In 1953, an article supported the original claim.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eAnother team uncovered the rest of the skeleton in a niche of an antechamber of the burial chamber in 1982, as per a recent press release. The “magnificent” tomb reflected a particularly high status, and Arsinoë IV was executed on the steps of the Temple of Artemis. That couplet of facts resulted in the subsequent hypothesis in 1990 that the royal might have been laid to rest here.\u003c/p\u003e"])</script><script>self.__next_f.push([1,"ef:T963,"])</script><script>self.__next_f.push([1,"\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eBut was she? \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cfigure class=\"wp-block-image size-full\"\u003e\u003cimg loading=\"lazy\" decoding=\"async\" width=\"1920\" height=\"1080\" src=\"https://cms.interestingengineering.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/202501_Weber_Abb5_01.jpg\" alt=\"\" class=\"wp-image-135343\" srcset=\"https://cms.interestingengineering.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/202501_Weber_Abb5_01.jpg 1920w, https://cms.interestingengineering.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/202501_Weber_Abb5_01.jpg?resize=300,169 300w, https://cms.interestingengineering.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/202501_Weber_Abb5_01.jpg?resize=768,432 768w, https://cms.interestingengineering.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/202501_Weber_Abb5_01.jpg?resize=1536,864 1536w\" sizes=\"auto, (max-width: 1920px) 100vw, 1920px\" /\u003e\u003cfigcaption class=\"wp-element-caption\"\u003eView of the Octagon in Ephesos along Curetes Street. Only the marble-clad base has survived. C: Austrian Academy of Sciences/\u003ca href=\"https://medienportal.univie.ac.at/en/media/recent-press-releases/detailansicht-en/artikel/cleopatras-sister-remains-missing/\"  target=\"_blank\"  rel=\"noopener noreferrer\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eAustrian Archaeological Institute\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/figcaption\u003e\u003c/figure\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003ch2 class=\"wp-block-heading\" id=\"h-studying-the-skull-of-cleopatra-s-sister\"\u003eStudying the skull of Cleopatra\u0026#8217;s sister\u003c/h2\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eRecent advancements in the University of Vienna\u0026#8217;s technological capabilities allowed the team of researchers to perform an exhaustive analysis to finally confirm the truth.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe first phase of the research involved taking a digital copy of the skull with micro-computed tomography and collecting samples from the base of the skull of the inner ear. Geneticists then confirmed that the skeleton in the antechamber matched the skull and samples of the femur.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe skull\u0026#8217;s age seemed to align with Keil\u0026#8217;s original analysis. Tests showed that it dates between 36 and 205 BCE. Arsinoë IV died within that timeframe, in 41 BCE. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u0026#8220;But then came the big surprise: in repeated tests, the skull and femur both clearly showed the presence of a Y chromosome \u0026#8211; in other words, a male,\u0026#8221; Gerhard Weber explained in a recent press \u003ca href=\"https://medienportal.univie.ac.at/en/media/recent-press-releases/detailansicht-en/artikel/cleopatras-sister-remains-missing/\"  target=\"_blank\"  rel=\"noopener noreferrer\" target=\"_blank\"\u003erelease\u003c/a\u003e.\u003c/p\u003e"])</script><script>self.__next_f.push([1,"f0:T6ad,"])</script><script>self.__next_f.push([1,"\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eAn intriguing profile emerged, but it looked nothing like her sister. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003ch2 class=\"wp-block-heading\" id=\"h-the-search-for-cleopatra-s-sister-continues\"\u003eThe search for Cleopatra\u0026#8217;s sister continues\u003c/h2\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eAfter 100 years, researchers determined the rightful owner of the \u003ca href=\"https://interestingengineering.com/science/britains-butchered-bones-cannibalism-study\"  target=\"_blank\"  rel=\"dofollow\"\u003eskull\u003c/a\u003e. It wasn\u0026#8217;t \u003ca href=\"https://interestingengineering.com/culture/marble-bust-possibly-depicting-cleopatra-true-face-found-egypt\"  target=\"_blank\"  rel=\"dofollow\"\u003eCleopatra’s\u003c/a\u003e sister who Marc Anthony ordered to be executed due to her attempt to usurp the throne. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003cspan style=\"margin: 0px;padding: 0px\"\u003eIt remains to be seen why the boy was buried in such a prominent location and s\u003c/span\u003eumptuous \u003ca href=\"https://interestingengineering.com/culture/a-2000-year-old-sarcophagus-found-in-egypt-and-its-contents-are-still-a-mystery\"  target=\"_blank\"  rel=\"dofollow\"\u003eEgyptian tomb\u003c/a\u003e. The study has opened up a field of questions\u0026nbsp;about the boy and Cleopatra\u0026#8217;s sister. The hunt for Arnisoe IV continues.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cfigure class=\"wp-block-embed is-type-video is-provider-youtube wp-block-embed-youtube wp-embed-aspect-16-9 Yoast SEO Premium plugin. --\u003e"])</script><script>self.__next_f.push([1,"f2:T102e,"])</script><script>self.__next_f.push([1,"\n\u003cp\u003eChinese automaker Chery has unveiled the latest edition of its SUV lineup, the Fulwin T8 plug-in hybrid electric vehicle (PHEV). Now available for pre-sale in China, the Fulwin T8 comes in 5-seater and 7-seater variants with price tags of $15K and $21.5K respectively.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe PHEV has a fuel consumption of 1.30L/62miles, with a worldwide harmonized light vehicles test cycle (WLTC) comprehensive range of 746 miles. The vehicle\u0026#8217;s real-world-tested comprehensive range has been clocked at 1,292 miles. Under fast charging, it takes 19 minutes to replenish the battery from 30% to 80%.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eAccording to reports, the vehicle\u0026#8217;s body comprises 80% high-strength steel and 20% hot-rolled steel. Aesthetically, the new Fulwin T8 follows the main design legacy of the Fulwin series, featuring an octagonal closed grille decorated with diamond dot matrix elements and the series logo.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003ch3 class=\"wp-block-heading\" id=\"h-packed-with-features\"\u003ePacked with features\u003c/h3\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe T8 features a roof spoiler and a high-mounted brake light at the back. It also features a through-type taillight group embedded with the FULWIN letter logo. Under the hood, Chery\u0026#8217;s new \u003ca href=\"https://interestingengineering.com/transportation/horse-1-2-litre-3-cylinder-turbocharged-hybrid-engine\"  target=\"_blank\"  rel=\"dofollow\"\u003ePHEV\u003c/a\u003e comes in two main variants: a 1.5-liter naturally aspirated engine and a 1.5-liter turbocharged engine mated to a dedicated hybrid transmission (DHT).\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe former can chuck out 101 hp (75 kW) and 125 Nm, while the turbocharged engine outputs 154 hp (115 kW) and 220 Nm. The entire series has a front electric motor that outputs 150 kW (201 hp) and 310 Nm. The car supports five driving modes: HEV, EV, standard, economy, and sports.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe PHEV\u0026#8217;s lithium iron phosphate battery pack also comes with a couple of options, namely 18.46 kWh and 18.66 kWh. This should be enough to provide a range between 40 miles and 81 miles.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cfigure class=\"wp-block-embed is-type-video is-provider-youtube wp-block-embed-youtube wp-embed-aspect-16-9 wp-has-aspect-ratio\"\u003e\u003cdiv class=\"wp-block-embed__wrapper\"\u003e\n\u003ciframe loading=\"lazy\" title=\"2025 Chery Fulwin T8 PHEV FirstLook Walkaround—Guangzhou Motor Show 2024 | 4K\" width=\"500\" height=\"281\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/3_3K5vklCcg?feature=oembed\" frameborder=\"0\" allow=\"accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share\" referrerpolicy=\"strict-origin-when-cross-origin\" allowfullscreen\u003e\u003c/iframe\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e\u003c/figure\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe car measures 15.5 feet (4.73 m) long, 6.1 feet (1.86 m) wide, and 5.73 feet (1.75 m) high. It also has a wheelbase of 8.9 feet (2.71 m) and weighs in at 2.07 tons and 2.1 tons for the 5-seater and 7-seater versions respectively.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003ch3 class=\"wp-block-heading\" id=\"h-state-of-the-art-interiors\"\u003eState of the art interiors\u003c/h3\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eInside the vehicle, the Fulwin T8 has a 10.25-inch instrument panel and a 15.6-inch 2.5K high-definition central control touch screen powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8155 chip. It also features a Lion 5.0 innovative cockpit system that supports the 4G network, voice recognition/control, and mobile phone APP remote control.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eAmazingly, the interior also benefits from heated seating and a 10-point massage function when the driver and passenger need to relax. From a safety perspective, the car has nine interior airbags, and 18 level 2+ advanced driving assistance capabilities. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eIt also has built-in mobile phone wireless charging on the center console, seat heating, ventilation, massage functions on the top trims, ambient lighting, and a 12-speaker Sony audio system.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe Fulwin T8 is already generating significant interest in China. As \u003ca href=\"https://interestingengineering.com/transportation/chinese-carmaker-chery-flying-car-and-all-solid-state-battery\"  target=\"_blank\"  rel=\"dofollow\"\u003eChery\u003c/a\u003e strengthens its hybrid portfolio, the Fulwin T8 stands out as a model that blends practicality and sophistication, redefining expectations in its class.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n"])</script><script>self.__next_f.push([1,"f3:T4aa,"])</script><script>self.__next_f.push([1,"\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eAccording to reports, the vehicle\u0026#8217;s body comprises 80% high-strength steel and 20% hot-rolled steel. Aesthetically, the new Fulwin T8 follows the main design legacy of the Fulwin series, featuring an octagonal closed grille decorated with diamond dot matrix elements and the series logo.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003ch3 class=\"wp-block-heading\" id=\"h-packed-with-features\"\u003ePacked with features\u003c/h3\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe T8 features a roof spoiler and a high-mounted brake light at the back. It also features a through-type taillight group embedded with the FULWIN letter logo. Under the hood, Chery\u0026#8217;s new \u003ca href=\"https://interestingengineering.com/transportation/horse-1-2-litre-3-cylinder-turbocharged-hybrid-engine\"  target=\"_blank\"  rel=\"dofollow\"\u003ePHEV\u003c/a\u003e comes in two main variants: a 1.5-liter naturally aspirated engine and a 1.5-liter turbocharged engine mated to a dedicated hybrid transmission (DHT).\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe former can chuck out 101 hp (75 kW) and 125 Nm, while the turbocharged engine outputs 154 hp (115 kW) and 220 Nm. The entire series has a front electric motor that outputs 150 kW (201 hp) and 310 Nm. The car supports five driving modes: HEV, EV, standard, economy, and sports.\u003c/p\u003e"])</script><script>self.__next_f.push([1,"f4:T6c3,"])</script><script>self.__next_f.push([1,"\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe PHEV\u0026#8217;s lithium iron phosphate battery pack also comes with a couple of options, namely 18.46 kWh and 18.66 kWh. This should be enough to provide a range between 40 miles and 81 miles.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cfigure class=\"wp-block-embed is-type-video is-provider-youtube wp-block-embed-youtube wp-embed-aspect-16-9 wp-has-aspect-ratio\"\u003e\u003cdiv class=\"wp-block-embed__wrapper\"\u003e\n\u003ciframe loading=\"lazy\" title=\"2025 Chery Fulwin T8 PHEV FirstLook Walkaround—Guangzhou Motor Show 2024 | 4K\" width=\"500\" height=\"281\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/3_3K5vklCcg?feature=oembed\" frameborder=\"0\" allow=\"accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share\" referrerpolicy=\"strict-origin-when-cross-origin\" allowfullscreen\u003e\u003c/iframe\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e\u003c/figure\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe car measures 15.5 feet (4.73 m) long, 6.1 feet (1.86 m) wide, and 5.73 feet (1.75 m) high. It also has a wheelbase of 8.9 feet (2.71 m) and weighs in at 2.07 tons and 2.1 tons for the 5-seater and 7-seater versions respectively.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003ch3 class=\"wp-block-heading\" id=\"h-state-of-the-art-interiors\"\u003eState of the art interiors\u003c/h3\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eInside the vehicle, the Fulwin T8 has a 10.25-inch instrument panel and a 15.6-inch 2.5K high-definition central control touch screen powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8155 chip. It also features a Lion 5.0 innovative cockpit system that supports the 4G network, voice recognition/control, and mobile phone APP remote control.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eAmazingly, the interior also benefits from heated seating and a 10-point massage function when the driver and passenger need to relax. From a safety perspective, the car has nine interior airbags, and 18 level 2+ advanced driving assistance capabilities. \u003c/p\u003e"])</script><script>self.__next_f.push([1,"f5:T1c3a,"])</script><script>self.__next_f.push([1,"\u003c!-- This site is optimized with the Yoast SEO Premium plugin v22.8 (Yoast SEO v22.8) - https://yoast.com/wordpress/plugins/seo/ --\u003e\n\u003ctitle\u003eMoon Crane: The Komatsu Moon Construction Model\u003c/title\u003e\n\u003cmeta name=\"description\" content=\"Komatsu presents their model for moon excavation, a project developed in conjunction with the government of Japan. Engineering\"},\"image\":{\"@id\":\"https://interestingengineering.com/#/schema/logo/image/\"},\"sameAs\":[\"https://www.facebook.com/interestingengineering/\",\"https://x.com/IntEngineering\",\"https://www.linkedin.com/company/interestingengineering/\"],\"email\":\"contact@interestingengineering.com\",\"numberOfEmployees\":{\"@type\":\"QuantitativeValue\",\"minValue\":\"201\",\"maxValue\":\"500\"},\"publishingPrinciples\":\"https://interestingengineering.com/home-page\"}]}\u003c/script\u003e\n\u003cmeta property=\"og:video\" content=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/f8hGpnujrVg\" /\u003e\n\u003cmeta property=\"og:video:type\" content=\"text/html\" /\u003e\n\u003cmeta property=\"og:video:duration\" content=\"50\" /\u003e\n\u003cmeta property=\"og:video:width\" content=\"480\" /\u003e\n\u003cmeta property=\"og:video:height\" content=\"270\" /\u003e\n\u003cmeta property=\"ya:ovs:adult\" content=\"false\" /\u003e\n\u003cmeta property=\"ya:ovs:upload_date\" content=\"2025-01-12T13:23:01+00:00\" /\u003e\n\u003cmeta property=\"ya:ovs:allow_embed\" content=\"true\" /\u003e\n\u003c!-- / Yoast SEO Premium plugin. --\u003e"])</script><script>self.__next_f.push([1,"f7:T1165,"])</script><script>self.__next_f.push([1,"\n\u003cp\u003eThe world\u0026#8217;s first carbon fiber passenger train, the CETROVO 1.0 Carbon Star Express, has now officially entered service in China. Operating on Metro Line 1 in Qingdao, East China\u0026#8217;s Shandong Province, the train began transporting passengers on Friday (January 10).\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eIndependently developed by Chinese companies, the CETROVO 1.0 marks a groundbreaking revolution in train technology. Its load-bearing structures (like the body and bogie frames) are primarily made of carbon fiber, making it lighter and more fuel-efficient than traditional all-metal trains.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe Metro Line 1 is a 37.2-mile stretch of railway with 41 stations and serves as a major north-south backbone line in Qingdao. According to the train\u0026#8217;s developer \u003ca href=\"http://en.people.cn/n3/2025/0110/c90000-20264742.html\"  target=\"_blank\"  rel=\"noopener noreferrer\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eCRRC Qingdao Sifang Co\u003c/a\u003e, CETROVO 1.0 is around 11% lighter than traditional trains of the same size. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe train can operate using 7% less energy due to its leaner weight. This translates into savings in carbon dioxide emissions of somewhere in the order of 130 tons every year. According to Chinese media, that is about the same as planting 6.7 hectares (100 acres) worth of trees.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003ch3 class=\"wp-block-heading\" id=\"h-carbon-fiber-trains-lighter-and-stronger\"\u003eCarbon fiber trains: lighter and stronger\u003c/h3\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://interestingengineering.com/innovation/shape-shifting-carbon-fiber-can-be-used-in-aerodynamics-robotics-and-more\"  target=\"_blank\"  rel=\"dofollow\"\u003eCarbon fibers\u003c/a\u003e are thin, strong crystalline carbon filaments. These filaments are essential chains of bonded carbon atoms that can be shaped into various forms. Their durable stiffness and high tensile strength makes carbon fibers ideal for manufacturing vehicular bodies or other structural elements.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cfigure class=\"wp-block-embed is-type-video is-provider-youtube wp-block-embed-youtube wp-embed-aspect-16-9 wp-has-aspect-ratio\"\u003e\u003cdiv class=\"wp-block-embed__wrapper\"\u003e\n\u003ciframe loading=\"lazy\" title=\"Mission Impossible: CRRC\u0026#039;s new carbon fiber metro vehicle – CETROVO\" width=\"500\" height=\"281\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/f8hGpnujrVg?feature=oembed\" frameborder=\"0\" allow=\"accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share\" referrerpolicy=\"strict-origin-when-cross-origin\" allowfullscreen\u003e\u003c/iframe\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e\u003c/figure\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe CETROVO 1.0 Carbon Star Express will not only play a vital role in meeting China\u0026#8217;s mass transportation needs but will also help reduce emissions associated with train travel in the country.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eHowever, the train\u0026#8217;s benefits are not limited to its improved efficiency and long-term sustainability. Carbon fiber is, pound-for-pound, about five times stronger than steel. It only weighs around 25% of the mass of steel, making it an excellent choice for lightweight rail vehicles.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eCarbon fiber trains are relatively more robust than steel ones, providing excellent impact resistance and extended structural lifespan. They also come with the added advantage of reduced vibration, resulting in a smoother, quieter ride for passengers.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003ch3 class=\"wp-block-heading\" id=\"h-light-at-the-end-of-the-tunnel\"\u003eLight at the end of the tunnel\u003c/h3\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eDevelopment of the CETROVO 1.0 Carbon Star Express commenced in 2021. After years of research and development, the train finally underwent testing between July and December of 2024. \u003ca href=\"https://interestingengineering.com/transportation/worlds-1st-carbon-fibre-train-china\"  target=\"_blank\"  rel=\"dofollow\"\u003eIn June of 2024\u003c/a\u003e, the train was able to reach speeds of 87 mph (140 kph). That exceeded the current average speed of 49.7 mph (80 kph) for Chinese metro trains.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eDuring this testing phase, the train completed over 50 technical evaluations and comprehensive system-to-vehicle testing to fully validate its performance. By the end of 2024, the train passed a further passenger trial and was finally given the green light on January 5.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe train is also fully automated, meaning it can operate for longer duration and with fewer down periods than manned trains. The train boasts intelligent safety features, including an anti-collision early warning system and an obstacle detection system that can automatically stop the train in emergencies.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\n"])</script><script>self.__next_f.push([1,"f8:T82c,"])</script><script>self.__next_f.push([1,"\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe Metro Line 1 is a 37.2-mile stretch of railway with 41 stations and serves as a major north-south backbone line in Qingdao. According to the train\u0026#8217;s developer \u003ca href=\"http://en.people.cn/n3/2025/0110/c90000-20264742.html\"  target=\"_blank\"  rel=\"noopener noreferrer\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eCRRC Qingdao Sifang Co\u003c/a\u003e, CETROVO 1.0 is around 11% lighter than traditional trains of the same size. \u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe train can operate using 7% less energy due to its leaner weight. This translates into savings in carbon dioxide emissions of somewhere in the order of 130 tons every year. According to Chinese media, that is about the same as planting 6.7 hectares (100 acres) worth of trees.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003ch3 class=\"wp-block-heading\" id=\"h-carbon-fiber-trains-lighter-and-stronger\"\u003eCarbon fiber trains: lighter and stronger\u003c/h3\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://interestingengineering.com/innovation/shape-shifting-carbon-fiber-can-be-used-in-aerodynamics-robotics-and-more\"  target=\"_blank\"  rel=\"dofollow\"\u003eCarbon fibers\u003c/a\u003e are thin, strong crystalline carbon filaments. These filaments are essential chains of bonded carbon atoms that can be shaped into various forms. Their durable stiffness and high tensile strength makes carbon fibers ideal for manufacturing vehicular bodies or other structural elements.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cfigure class=\"wp-block-embed is-type-video is-provider-youtube wp-block-embed-youtube wp-embed-aspect-16-9 wp-has-aspect-ratio\"\u003e\u003cdiv class=\"wp-block-embed__wrapper\"\u003e\n\u003ciframe loading=\"lazy\" title=\"Mission Impossible: CRRC\u0026#039;s new carbon fiber metro vehicle – CETROVO\" width=\"500\" height=\"281\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/f8hGpnujrVg?feature=oembed\" frameborder=\"0\" allow=\"accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share\" referrerpolicy=\"strict-origin-when-cross-origin\" allowfullscreen\u003e\u003c/iframe\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e\u003c/figure\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eThe CETROVO 1.0 Carbon Star Express will not only play a vital role in meeting China\u0026#8217;s mass transportation needs but will also help reduce emissions associated with train travel in the country.\u003c/p\u003e"])</script><script>self.__next_f.push([1,"f9:T481,"])</script><script>self.__next_f.push([1,"\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eHowever, the train\u0026#8217;s benefits are not limited to its improved efficiency and long-term sustainability. Carbon fiber is, pound-for-pound, about five times stronger than steel. It only weighs around 25% of the mass of steel, making it an excellent choice for lightweight rail vehicles.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eCarbon fiber trains are relatively more robust than steel ones, providing excellent impact resistance and extended structural lifespan. They also come with the added advantage of reduced vibration, resulting in a smoother, quieter ride for passengers.\u003c/p\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003ch3 class=\"wp-block-heading\" id=\"h-light-at-the-end-of-the-tunnel\"\u003eLight at the end of the tunnel\u003c/h3\u003e\n\n\n\n\u003cp\u003eDevelopment of the CETROVO 1.0 Carbon Star Express commenced in 2021. After years of research and development, the train finally underwent testing between July and December of 2024. \u003ca href=\"https://interestingengineering.com/transportation/worlds-1st-carbon-fibre-train-china\"  target=\"_blank\"  rel=\"dofollow\"\u003eIn June of 2024\u003c/a\u003e, the train was able to reach speeds of 87 mph (140 kph). That exceeded the current average speed of 49.7 mph (80 kph) for Chinese metro trains.\u003c/p\u003e"])</script><script>self.__next_f.push([1,"19:[[\"$\",\"$L1b\",null,{\"articleType\":\"article\",\"author\":\"Ameya Paleja\",\"publishDate\":\"2021-11-16\",\"title\":\"An Study\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\\r\\n\u003c/ul\u003e\",\"has_no_index\":0,\"url\":\"culture/3000-year-old-mega-fortress-40-times-larger-than-expected\",\"publish_date\":\"2025-01-13T12:47:13\",\"timeAgo\":\"16 Erb-Satullo\u003c/a\u003e\"}},\"embed_url\":\"\",\"duration\":\"\",\"author\":{\"owner\":[{\"name\":\"Maria Mocerino\",\"slug\":\"maria-mocerino\",\"surname\":\"\",\"avatar\":\"https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/b13b723c1c12c2feb2e14a19e63d68a9?s=96\u0026d=mm\u0026r=g\",\"page_url\":\"maria-mocerino\",\"author_url\":\"https://interestingengineering.com/author/maria-mocerino\",\"description\":\"Originally from LA, Maria Mocerino has been published in Business Insider, The Irish Examiner, The Rogue Mag, Chacruna Institute for Psychedelic Plant Medicines, and now Interesting Engineering.\"}]},\"body_parts\":[\"\\n\u003cp\u003eArchaeologists discovered that Dmanisis Gora, a stunning 3,000-year-old “mega fortress” in the Caucasus, was so large that they had to take to the skies to capture its “exceptional size.”\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eCranfield University academic Erb-Satullo and Dimitri Jachvliani, his co-director from the Georgian National Museum, began investigating the Dmanisis Gora settlement in 2018.\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eHowever, only recently did the full scope of the well-preserved site reveal itself to researchers when the autumn season stripped the landscape bare of its fauna. In the summer, the grass had reached their knees, obstructing the view.\u003c/p\u003e\",\"$25\",\"\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eThe team used a DJI Phantom 4 RTK drone, which provided “relative positional accuracy of under 2cm as well as extremely high-resolution aerial imagery.”\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003e“The drone took nearly 11,000 pictures, which were knitted together using advanced software to produce high-resolution digital elevation models and orthophotos – composite pictures that show every point as if you were looking straight down,” Dr Erb-Satullo continued.\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eThe site was 40 times larger than they originally surveyed, effectively spanning 148 -198 acres. “The use of drones has allowed us to understand the significance of the site and document it in a way that simply wouldn’t have been possible on the ground,\u0026#8221; Dr Erb-Satullo said. \u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eFurthermore, they investigated how the landscape had evolved using declassified spy satellite imagery, a resource that archaeologists continue to benefit from in recent years.\u003c/p\u003e\",\"$26\",\"\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eDmanisis Gora, a fortress \u003ca href=\\\"https://interestingengineering.com/culture/3000-year-old-shang-city-oldest-ever-in-china\\\"  target=\\\"_blank\\\"  rel=\\\"dofollow\\\"\u003esettlement\u003c/a\u003e of “exceptional preservation and size, “ is indicative of the region\u0026#8217;s rich prehistory and will contribute to current understandings of how these ancient mega-structures expanded globally.\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cfigure class=\\\"wp-block-embed is-type-video is-provider-youtube wp-block-embed-youtube wp-embed-aspect-16-9 wp-has-aspect-ratio\\\"\u003e\u003cdiv class=\\\"wp-block-embed__wrapper\\\"\u003e\\n\u003ciframe loading=\\\"lazy\\\" title=\\\"The Return of the Ekranoplan\\\" width=\\\"500\\\" height=\\\"281\\\" src=\\\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/q-hr-Qc4Dz0?feature=oembed\\\" frameborder=\\\"0\\\" allow=\\\"accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share\\\" referrerpolicy=\\\"strict-origin-when-cross-origin\\\" allowfullscreen\u003e\u003c/iframe\u003e\\n\u003c/div\u003e\u003c/figure\u003e\\n\"],\"paywall_parts\":\"\",\"first_paragraph\":\"\",\"comment_count\":1,\"last_part_count\":0,\"permalink\":\"https://interestingengineering.com/culture/3000-year-old-mega-fortress-40-times-larger-than-expected\",\"video_recommendations\":[],\"source_type\":0,\"source_target\":\"\",\"connatix_script_id\":\"\",\"connatix_media_id\":\"\",\"acf_data\":{\"ie_id\":\"\",\"ie_score\":\"\",\"ie_featured_image\":\"\",\"ie_featured_image_description\":\"Oblique aerial view of outer enclosure from the northwest.\",\"ie_featured_image_reference\":\"\u003ca href=\\\"https://www.cambridge.org/core/journals/antiquity/article/megafortresses-in-the-south-caucasus-new-data-from-southern-georgia/7752B2551034811556C96E75E909D730#article\\\"\u003eN. Erb-Satullo\u003c/a\u003e\",\"ie_related_content\":\"\u003cul\u003e\\r\\n \\t\u003cli\u003e\u003ca href=\\\"https://interestingengineering.com/culture/cleopatra-sister-skull-belongs-to-boy\\\"\u003eSkull of Cleopatra’s sister turns out to be remains of 11-year-old boy\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\\r\\n \\t\u003cli\u003e\u003ca href=\\\"https://interestingengineering.com/culture/1524-moche-family-tomb-human-sacrifice\\\"\u003ePeru tomb reveals 1,500-year-old shocking ritual of sacrificing close relatives\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\\r\\n \\t\u003cli\u003e\u003ca Study\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\\r\\n\u003c/ul\u003e\",\"settings\":{\"is_premium_article\":false,\"is_affiliate_article\":false,\"is_seo_article\":false,\"is_listicle_article\":false,\"is_sponsored_article\":false},\"affiliate\":null,\"sponsor_type\":false,\"company_name\":\"\",\"company_logo\":null,\"company_logo_url\":\"\",\"sponsor_link\":\"\",\"update_date\":\"\",\"is_ces_photo_article\":false},\"articleAudio\":\"\"},{\"id\":135516,\"tags\":[\"China\",\"Inventions and Countries across the globe implemented drastic measures, ranging from quarantines and social-distancing protocols to border closures and to curb the spread of the virus. \u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eIndividuals who had undertaken travel or been exposed to infected persons were required to isolate themselves for extended periods to reduce community transmission. In some countries, authorities adopted strategies such as public disclosure of identities and locations of those in isolation to enforce compliance. Kapil holds a dual bachelor's degree in Electrical, Electronics, and Communication Engineering and a master’s diploma in journalism from the Institute of Journalism and New Media in Bangalore.\"}]},\"body_parts\":[\"\\n\u003cp\u003eResearchers at the University of Queensland are making significant strides toward developing a groundbreaking topical cream to prevent and treat skin cancers, specifically in organ transplant recipients.\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eThis pioneering treatment has secured funding of $344,000 from the National Foundation for Medical Research and Innovation, which will facilitate progress through essential pre-clinical development stages.\u003c/p\u003e\",\"$77\",\"\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eThe necessity for such a treatment arises from the reality faced by transplant recipients: to prevent organ rejection, these individuals must take immunosuppressive medications.\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eWhile these drugs are life-saving, they also significantly elevate the risk of developing certain skin cancers, notably squamous cell carcinomas (SCC) and Kaposi\u0026#8217;s Sarcoma.\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eDr. Wells clarified the challenge: “Currently, there are no FDA-approved drugs specifically targeting squamous cell carcinomas in patients who have undergone organ transplants. Instead, managing these skin cancers involves ongoing medical assessments and surgical interventions throughout their lives, until the cancer advances to a point where it metastasizes.”\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eHe noted that the current management options leave patients with limited choices that do not compromise the integrity of their transplanted organs. “This new treatment could truly be transformative for these individuals,” he added.\u003c/p\u003e\",\"$78\",\"\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eThe urgency of developing effective therapies for skin cancer in transplant patients is underscored by statistics indicating that the incidence of skin cancer in these individuals is significantly higher than in the general population.\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eContinued advancements like this topical cream are essential for medical innovation and improving the quality of life for thousands of transplant recipients worldwide.\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eWith the promise of moving towards clinical trials, the research team remains hopeful that their work will soon lead to better health outcomes and renewed optimism for individuals at increased risk of skin cancer due to necessary immunosuppressive High-resolution dental roots and skull base images further validated the picture that was beginning to develop. It looked nothing like Josef Keil’s original snapshot.\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eIn a surprising twist, they discovered that the 11-14-year-old \u003cem\u003eboy\u003c/em\u003e was even Roman. He suffered from a developmental pathology, if not a genetic syndrome, such as Treacher Collins syndrome mixed with a severe vitamin-D deficiency. One of his cranial bones, which doesn’t normally fuse until the age of 65, had already closed, effectively deforming the skull.\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eThe underdeveloped upper jaw, “unusually angled downwards,” was “the most striking feature.” The boy most likely couldn’t chew. Operating on Metro Line 1 in Qingdao, East China\u0026#8217;s Shandong Province, the train began transporting passengers on Friday (January 10).\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eIndependently developed by Chinese companies, the CETROVO 1.0 marks a groundbreaking revolution in train technology. Its load-bearing structures (like the body and bogie frames) are primarily made of carbon fiber, making it lighter and more fuel-efficient than traditional all-metal trains.\u003c/p\u003e\",\"$8a\",\"$8b\",\"\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eDuring this testing phase, the train completed over 50 technical evaluations and comprehensive system-to-vehicle testing to fully validate its performance. By the end of 2024, the train passed a further passenger trial and was finally given the green light on January 5.\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eThe train is also fully automated, meaning it can operate for longer duration and with fewer down periods than manned trains. Erb-Satullo\u003c/a\u003e\"}},\"embed_url\":\"\",\"duration\":\"\",\"author\":{\"owner\":[{\"name\":\"Maria Mocerino\",\"slug\":\"maria-mocerino\",\"surname\":\"\",\"avatar\":\"https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/b13b723c1c12c2feb2e14a19e63d68a9?s=96\u0026d=mm\u0026r=g\",\"page_url\":\"maria-mocerino\",\"author_url\":\"https://interestingengineering.com/author/maria-mocerino\",\"description\":\"Originally from LA, Maria Mocerino has been published in Business Insider, The Irish Examiner, The Rogue Mag, Chacruna Institute for Psychedelic Plant Medicines, and now Interesting Engineering.\"}]},\"body_parts\":[\"\\n\u003cp\u003eArchaeologists discovered that Dmanisis Gora, a stunning 3,000-year-old “mega fortress” in the Caucasus, was so large that they had to take to the skies to capture its “exceptional size.”\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eCranfield University academic Erb-Satullo and Dimitri Jachvliani, his co-director from the Georgian National Museum, began investigating the Dmanisis Gora settlement in 2018.\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eHowever, only recently did the full scope of the well-preserved site reveal itself to researchers when the autumn season stripped the landscape bare of its fauna. In the summer, the grass had reached their knees, obstructing the view.\u003c/p\u003e\",\"$93\",\"\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eThe team used a DJI Phantom 4 RTK drone, which provided “relative positional accuracy of under 2cm as well as extremely high-resolution aerial imagery.”\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003e“The drone took nearly 11,000 pictures, which were knitted together using advanced software to produce high-resolution digital elevation models and orthophotos – composite pictures that show every point as if you were looking straight down,” Dr Erb-Satullo continued.\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eThe site was 40 times larger than they originally surveyed, effectively spanning 148 -198 acres. “The use of drones has allowed us to understand the significance of the site and document it in a way that simply wouldn’t have been possible on the ground,\u0026#8221; Dr Erb-Satullo said. \u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eFurthermore, they investigated how the landscape had evolved using declassified spy satellite imagery, a resource that archaeologists continue to benefit from in recent years.\u003c/p\u003e\",\"$94\",\"\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eDmanisis Gora, a fortress \u003ca href=\\\"https://interestingengineering.com/culture/3000-year-old-shang-city-oldest-ever-in-china\\\"  target=\\\"_blank\\\"  rel=\\\"dofollow\\\"\u003esettlement\u003c/a\u003e of “exceptional preservation and size, “ is indicative of the region\u0026#8217;s rich prehistory and will contribute to current understandings of how these ancient mega-structures expanded globally.\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cfigure class=\\\"wp-block-embed is-type-video is-provider-youtube wp-block-embed-youtube wp-embed-aspect-16-9 wp-has-aspect-ratio\\\"\u003e\u003cdiv class=\\\"wp-block-embed__wrapper\\\"\u003e\\n\u003ciframe loading=\\\"lazy\\\" title=\\\"The Return of the Ekranoplan\\\" width=\\\"500\\\" height=\\\"281\\\" src=\\\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/q-hr-Qc4Dz0?feature=oembed\\\" frameborder=\\\"0\\\" allow=\\\"accelerometer; IBS.\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eThis means that there is a roughly two times the probability of someone suffering from IBS potentially also suffering from ED symptoms—a bit of a double Instead, managing these skin cancers involves ongoing medical assessments and surgical interventions throughout their lives, until the cancer advances to a point where it metastasizes.”\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eHe noted that the current management options leave patients with limited choices that do not compromise the integrity of their transplanted organs. “This new treatment could truly be transformative for these individuals,” he added.\u003c/p\u003e\",\"$e6\",\"\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eThe urgency of developing effective therapies for skin cancer in transplant patients is underscored by statistics indicating that the incidence of skin cancer in these individuals is significantly higher than in the general population.\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eContinued advancements like this topical cream are essential for medical innovation and improving the quality of life for thousands of transplant crisis.\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eA study by scientists at the University of California, San Diego (UCSD) has unveiled a potential weakness in antibiotic-resistant bacteria.\u003c/p\u003e\",\"\",\"$e9\",\"\",\"$ea\",\"$eb\",\"\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eIn a related initiative announced in October, Süel and his team at the University of Chicago introduced a bioelectronic device that harnesses the natural electrical activity of skin bacteria.\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eThis innovation has shown promise in reducing infections caused by Staphylococcus epidermidis, a common bacterium linked to hospital-acquired infections and rising antibiotic resistance.\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eBoth studies emphasize the potential of using charged ions to regulate bacterial behaviors.\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eSüel highlighted the urgency of exploring such drug-free alternatives, stating, \u0026#8220;We are running out of effective antibiotics, and their widespread usage has led to contamination across the globe, including in the oceans and our water supply.\u0026#8221;\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eThe research indicates that new, sustainable methods to control bacterial infections without relying on antibiotics are feasible and necessary.\u003c/p\u003e\",\"\\n\"],\"paywall_parts\":\"\",\"first_paragraph\":\"\",\"comment_count\":0,\"last_part_count\":0,\"permalink\":\"https://interestingengineering.com/health/killing-drug-resistant-bacteria-superbugs\",\"video_recommendations\":[],\"source_type\":0,\"source_target\":\"\",\"connatix_script_id\":\"\",\"connatix_media_id\":\"\",\"acf_data\":{\"ie_id\":\"\",\"ie_score\":\"\",\"ie_featured_image\":\"\",\"ie_featured_image_description\":\"Representative High-resolution dental roots and skull base images further validated the picture that was beginning to develop. It looked nothing like Josef Keil’s original snapshot.\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eIn a surprising twist, they discovered that the 11-14-year-old \u003cem\u003eboy\u003c/em\u003e was even Roman. He suffered from a developmental pathology, if not a genetic syndrome, such as Treacher Collins syndrome mixed with a severe vitamin-D deficiency. One of his cranial bones, which doesn’t normally fuse until the age of 65, had already closed, effectively deforming the skull.\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eThe underdeveloped upper jaw, “unusually angled downwards,” was “the most striking feature.” The boy most likely couldn’t chew. The first permanent molar showed no signs of use at all. Operating on Metro Line 1 in Qingdao, East China\u0026#8217;s Shandong Province, the train began transporting passengers on Friday (January 10).\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eIndependently developed by Chinese companies, the CETROVO 1.0 marks a groundbreaking revolution in train technology. Its load-bearing structures (like the body and bogie frames) are primarily made of carbon fiber, making it lighter and more fuel-efficient than traditional all-metal trains.\u003c/p\u003e\",\"$f8\",\"$f9\",\"\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eDuring this testing phase, the train completed over 50 technical evaluations and comprehensive system-to-vehicle testing to fully validate its performance. By the end of 2024, the train passed a further passenger trial and was finally given the green light on January 5.\u003c/p\u003e\\n\\n\\n\\n\u003cp\u003eThe train is also fully automated, meaning it can operate for longer duration and with fewer down periods than manned trains.
